GapFillDragDrop.Title: Past Simple questions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
A: Didyou have a good holiday last week?
B: Yes, we did. We visited Barcelona for four days.
A: Oh, fantastic! Did you stayin a hotel?
B: Yes, we stayedin a really good hotel in the centre of the city.
A: What did you dothere?
B: We walkedfor hours every day and we were very tired! Wevisitedall Gaudi's buildings and his park.
A: Did you eatin some really nice restaurants?
B: No, we didn't. We decidedto use our money for other things.
